attraction_reviewComments: After visiting, my husband and I decided to pack up and move here from southern Orange County! We love the peace and quiet and the beautiful scenery.
Humboldt Bay is a beautiful majestic place. It is a perfect place for yourself or your family to stop for a picnic.
I would recommend to go check out the boats some big sail boats. Wish we were there at night the lights would have been pretty. Parking is kind of hard to find lots of of nice... read more
Humboldt Bay, along with the adjoining Arcata Bay, dominate the landscape around Eureka. It's not always easy to get to the bay, though, and it lacks footpaths along much of... read more
Take a walk along the boardwalk of the bay. It is beautiful. Take a ride on the bay in the madaket. It does cost., but a fun trip to be able to ride around the bay and see some... read more
Driving by the Humboldt Bay, you can smell and clean water and fresh air. The forest, bridge, and the vista spots are really nice for you to get out of your busy life style and... read more
Humboldt Bay, the coast going to and from the bay was just breathtaking. You won't be disappointed if you love the ocean and coastal area.
This was a nice place to meader around and enjoy the sun after the fog dissipated. Easy strolling, kids and dogs can run and play.
mention_address: "Humboldt Bay, King Salmon Avenue, Humboldt Bay Power Plant, King Salmon, Humboldt County, California, 95503, United States of America"
